title: BRIEF-Spirit Aerosystems Reports Fourth Quarter And Full-Year 2020 Results
text:
* Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $1.31 EXCLUDING ITEMS

* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $2.85

* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $-0.85 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA

* Q4 REVENUE $877 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $894.8 MILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS- SPIRIT'S BACKLOG AT END OF Q4 OF 2020 WAS ABOUT $34 BILLION, WITH WORK PACKAGES ON ALL COMMERCIAL PLATFORMS IN BOEING & AIRBUS BACKLOG

* FUSELAGE SYSTEMS SEGMENT REVENUE IN Q4 OF 2020 DECREASED 59% FROM SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR TO $426 MILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - SPIRIT'S Q4 OF 2020 REVENUE WAS $877 MILLION, DOWN FROM SAME PERIOD OF 2019, PRIMARILY DUE TO SIGNIFICANTLY LOWER 737 MAX PRODUCTION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS -FUSELAGE SYSTEMS SEGMENT REVENUE DECREASED PRIMARILY DUE TO LOWER PRODUCTION VOLUMES ON BOEING 737, 787, AIRBUS A350 PROGRAMS

* Q4 BOEING 737 MAX DELIVERIES OF 19 SHIPSETS COMPARED TO 153 SHIPSETS IN SAME PERIOD OF PRIOR YEAR

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - DURING EARNINGS CALL, MANAGEMENT WILL ADDRESS PRELIMINARY ASSESSMENT OF PURCHASE ACCOUNTING TREATMENT RELATED TO BOMBARDIER DEAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
